objects.name: sandwich bag
objects.description: An elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.

objects.name: a clove of garlic
objects.description: A pungent clove of garlic.

objects.name: a hot pepper sandwich
objects.description: A hot pepper sandwich that sets your mouth on fire.

objects.name: the front door
objects.description: A locked front door of the house, nailed shut from inside.

objects.name: an old wooden door
objects.description: An old wooden door with a large hole in it.

objects.name: a small mailbox
objects.description: A small mailbox by the west of the house.

objects.name: the kitchen window (outside)
objects.description: A small window on the east wall of the house.

objects.name: the kitchen window (inside)
objects.description: A small window over the sink.

objects.name: a clear glass bottle
objects.description: A transparent glass bottle, possibly for liquids.

objects.name: some water
objects.description: Just ordinary water.

objects.name: a large oriental rug
objects.description: A large oriental rug lying by the fireplace.

objects.name: a piece of paper
objects.description: An old edition of US News & Dungeon Report.

objects.name: an elvish sword
objects.description: An elvish sword of great antiquity, rumored to glow in danger.

objects.name: a brass lantern
objects.description: A battery-powered brass lantern.

objects.name: a clay brick
objects.description: A clay brick that might explode under certain conditions.

objects.name: a large coil of rope
objects.description: A sturdy coil of rope, possibly useful for climbing or tying.

objects.name: a nasty-looking knife
objects.description: A sharp, nasty-looking knife.

objects.name: a trap door
objects.description: A trap door in the floor, barred from above.

objects.name: a basket at the top of the shaft
objects.description: A sturdy iron basket hanging from the chain at the top of the shaft.

objects.name: a basket at the bottom of the shaft
objects.description: Another iron basket on the chain, down below.

objects.name: a giant vampire bat
objects.description: A deranged giant vampire bat, swooping from the ceiling.

objects.name: a nasty-looking troll
objects.description: A nasty-looking troll with a bloody axe.

objects.name: a bloody axe
objects.description: A bloody axe, presumably used by the troll.

objects.name: a suspicious-looking individual
objects.description: A suspicious-looking individual with a bag, holding a vicious stiletto.

objects.name: a vicious stiletto
objects.description: A vicious-looking stiletto, used by the thief.

objects.name: a rusty old box
objects.description: A rusty old box embedded in the wall.

objects.name: a small slot
objects.description: A narrow slot in the front of the rusty box.

objects.name: a warning card
objects.description: A card reading: 'Detonation of explosives is strictly prohibited here.'

objects.name: Lord Dimwit's gaudy crown
objects.description: An excessively gaudy crown of Lord Dimwit Flathead.

objects.name: a sapphire-encrusted bracelet
objects.description: A bracelet encrusted with sapphires.

objects.name: a broken sharp stick
objects.description: A wooden stick, broken and sharp.

objects.name: a large wicker balloon basket
objects.description: A heavy wicker basket with a cloth bag and a metal receptacle.

objects.name: a cloth bag (balloon envelope)
objects.description: A large cloth bag that can inflate with hot air.

objects.name: a braided wire rope
objects.description: A thin but strong braided wire, used for tethering the balloon.

objects.name: a metal receptacle
objects.description: A metal container inside the balloon basket, presumably for fuel.

objects.name: a balloon, broken into pieces
objects.description: A large balloon, now ripped and destroyed.

objects.name: a folded plastic inflatable boat
objects.description: A folded pile of plastic with a small valve attached.

objects.name: a plastic boat (with a large hole)
objects.description: A boat with a large hole, useless unless patched.

objects.name: an inflated magic boat
objects.description: A fully inflated plastic boat from Frobozz Magic Boat Company.

objects.name: a small hand-held air pump
objects.description: A small pump for inflating items.

objects.name: a coil of thin shiny wire
objects.description: A coil of wire, possibly usable as a fuse.

objects.name: some gunk or glue-like putty
objects.description: A viscous material for patching holes.

objects.name: a tube of putty
objects.description: A tube that looks like toothpaste but contains thick putty.

objects.name: a set of skeleton keys
objects.description: Keys that might unlock a grating or door.

objects.name: a wrench
objects.description: A sturdy wrench for loosening bolts.

objects.name: a screwdriver
objects.description: A small screwdriver from the maintenance gear.

objects.name: a large bolt
objects.description: A large bolt controlling water flow at the dam.

objects.name: a large emerald
objects.description: A brilliant green emerald, about the size of a hen's egg.

objects.name: a platinum bar
objects.description: A large bar of platinum, quite heavy.

objects.name: a pearl necklace
objects.description: A necklace of hundreds of large pearls.

objects.name: a valuable grail
objects.description: An extremely valuable grail, perhaps original.

objects.name: a nervous Volcano Gnome
objects.description: A small, nervous gnome who glances at his watch.

objects.name: a lurking ghost
objects.description: A sinister ghost drifting about, moaning quietly.

objects.name: everything
objects.description: A pseudo-object for 'take all' commands.

objects.name: valuables
objects.description: A pseudo-object for 'take all valuables' commands.

objects.name: four heads on poles
objects.description: Four decapitated heads mounted on poles. Disturbing.

objects.name: a large marble tomb
objects.description: A marble tomb inscribed with 'Feel Free.'

objects.name: a pile of empty Coke bottles
objects.description: Many empty Coke bottles evidently from the implementers.

objects.name: a stack of line-printer listings
objects.description: A gigantic pile of line-printer output, mostly unintelligible.
